719422f-b.text:
(1)
East Broadway, north side, at Jeffersem Street. Shown i the Seward Park Branch of the New York Public Library, at the N.E. corner
of Jefferson Street.
1924.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same.
1924.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)  A view of the Jefferson Street side, as seen from Seward Park. Also shown is a view eastward on Division Street, from Jeffersoh
Street.
1924.
P. L. Sperr.

719423f-a.text:
East Broadway (left), east from but not including Jefferson Street, showing a general view of the surrounding area with the Williamsburg Bridge in the background. This view is from the Jewish Daily Forward Building, 173-175 East Broadway, south side, between Rutgers and Jefferson
Streets.
February 14, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719423f-a.folder: East Broadway & Jefferson Street, Manhattan, NY

719421f-b.text:
East Broadway, north side, east across Jefferson Street, showing on the far side of same, the Seward Park branch of the New York Public Library. Incidentally, Jefferson Street parallels East Broadway, tho this short portion at it's terminus retains that identity. Cn the left is P portion of the Park that has
given it's name to this structure.
June 23, 1939
No's. 1-2
E: e48555reas
